Daitsu Chisho


Who Is It That's Binding You?



Acting From A Perceived Sense Of Self-existence Creates A Gap Between 'me' And What I Perceive. Although It Is An Illusion, This Gap Is The Cause Of All Suffering So We Try To Fill The Gap With Objects Such As Cars, Relationships, And So Forth. Once We Begin To See More Clearly, We Realize That We Are Responsible For For Our Own Mind And That We Don't Need To Be Saved Or Made Whole. We Can Discover Our Own Natural Completeness.
